channel.title: Help please
channel.description: please my im running the server on vps it works fine , but its just not working for me on my desktopor others i changed .jar though but nothing works PORTS ARE OPEN

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Make sure the IP of the client is connecting to the vps that it’s being run from, not localhost or anything else.

Make sure that the firewall isn’t blocking your ports on the vps, common.

Read full topic
